name: The Lost Crown of Eldoria
setting: A medieval fantasy kingdom on the brink of civil war. The rightful heir's crown has been stolen, and various factions vie for power. The kingdom of Eldoria is known for its ancient magic and political intrigue.
overarching_goal: Recover the Lost Crown of Eldoria and restore the rightful heir to the throne before the kingdom descends into chaos.

Queen Regent Mirabel.description: The aging queen regent, struggling to maintain order in the absence of the crown. She appears weary but determined, with silver hair and piercing blue eyes.
knowledge: The crown was stolen three nights ago from the royal vault
Only members of the royal bloodline can wear the crown safely
There are rumors of a secret passage beneath the castle

relationships.Lord Blackwood: Distrusts him deeply, suspects his involvement
relationships.Captain Aldric: Trusts completely, her most loyal guard

notes: Will reward handsomely for the crown's return
Knows ancient lore about the kingdom's founding

Lord Blackwood.description: A charismatic noble with a shadowy past. Tall, dark-haired, always impeccably dressed. Commands significant military forces.
knowledge: Has been consolidating power among the northern lords
Claims to have proof the current royal line is illegitimate
Maintains a private army under the guise of 'security forces'
notes: May not be the actual thief but definitely has ulterior motives
His estate is heavily guarded

Captain Aldric.description: The captain of the royal guard. A battle-scarred veteran in his fifties with unwavering loyalty to the crown. Missing his left eye from a past battle.
knowledge: Was on duty the night of the theft but saw nothing suspicious
Knows the castle's defensive capabilities and secret passages
Suspects an inside job due to disabled magical wards

relationships.Queen Regent Mirabel: Sworn protector, would die for her

notes: Can provide military support if trust is earned
Has contacts throughout the kingdom's guard forces

The Shadow Broker.description: A mysterious information dealer who operates from the city's underbelly. No one knows their true identity. They communicate through intermediaries.
knowledge: Knows who hired the thieves but won't reveal without payment
Has informants in every major faction
notes: Everything has a price
Never breaks a contract or reveals a client

Elara the Sage.description: An ancient elven scholar who lives in a tower outside the capital. She has studied the crown's history for centuries and possesses vast magical knowledge.
knowledge: The crown contains protective enchantments against pretenders
A false heir wearing the crown will be consumed by magical fire
The crown can be tracked using a special divination ritual

relationships.The Old Kingdom: One of the few remaining who remember it

notes: Will help if approached respectfully
Her tower contains a vast library of ancient texts

Castle Eldoria.description: The grand royal castle sits atop a hill overlooking the capital city. Its white stone walls have stood for five hundred years, though recent tensions have dimmed its former glory.
notable_events: The crown was stolen from the royal vault three nights ago
Queen Regent holds court here daily
notes: The royal vault is magically sealed and heavily guarded
Secret passages connect various parts of the castle

The Gilded Quarter.description: The wealthy district where nobles maintain their city estates. Opulent mansions line cobblestone streets, guarded by private forces.
notes: Lord Blackwood's estate is the largest in the quarter
Many nobles are choosing sides in the coming power struggle

The Shadowed Alleys.description: The darker side of the capital, where thieves, smugglers, and information brokers conduct their business away from official eyes. A maze of narrow streets and hidden doorways.
notes: The Shadow Broker can be contacted through the One-Eyed Raven tavern
Not safe for the unwary, but information flows freely here

Elara's Tower.description: An isolated tower of white marble standing in an ancient forest three miles from the capital. Magical wards shimmer around it, and the trees seem to whisper secrets.
notes: The tower is protected by powerful enchantments
Contains one of the largest libraries of ancient knowledge in the realm

The Royal Vault.description: Deep beneath Castle Eldoria lies the royal vault, a chamber carved from solid bedrock and reinforced with ancient magic. This is where the kingdom's most precious artifacts are kept.
notable_events: The Crown of Eldoria was stolen from here under mysterious circumstances
Magical wards were disabled without triggering alarms
notes: Only the Queen Regent and Captain Aldric have keys
The theft suggests someone with intimate knowledge of the security

plot_threads.title: The Stolen Crown
plot_threads.description: The Crown of Eldoria has been stolen from the royal vault. Without it, the rightful heir cannot be crowned, and the kingdom teeters on the edge of civil war. The party must discover who took it and recover it before chaos erupts.

plot_threads.title: The Northern Conspiracy
plot_threads.description: Lord Blackwood has been quietly consolidating power among the northern lords. His intentions are unclear, but he claims to have evidence that the current royal line is illegitimate. Is he behind the theft, or is he preparing for something else?

plot_threads.title: Secrets of the Old Kingdom
plot_threads.description: The crown is more than just a symbol of authorityâ€”it contains ancient magic from the founding of the kingdom. Elara the Sage knows its history, and her knowledge may be key to understanding why it was stolen and how to safely recover it.
